title: McNulty Keeps UAE’s Stranglehold on Grand Tour Leader’s Jerseys Alive at Vuelta
content:
With McNulty's red jersey Saturday, the team has now claimed 40 grand tour leader's jerseys out of 43 days of racing so far in 2024.

Read the full article at McNulty Keeps UAE’s Stranglehold on Grand Tour Leader’s Jerseys Alive at Vuelta on Velo.
author: ahood
